description.p: Compute the variance of the expression over all rows that satisfy the expression.
An expression or field. The data type must be N.
Returns the variance of the expression over all rows that satisfy the expression.

discussion.p: The Variance function computes the variance of the expression over all rows that satisfy the expression or all rows for a field.

example.caption: Variance() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT Variance(Quantity) AS Expr1 FROM [Order Details] Order_Details =361.838271213972
